question: A museum near your house is looking for people to do part-time voluntary!Unpaid work. You would like to do some voluntary/unpaid work at the museum.Write a letter to the museum director to apply for the voluntary/unpaid work in your letter:•	Explain why you want to do voluntary/unpaid work at the museum•	Describe some skills and qualities you have that would be useful•	Give details of when you would be available for work
text: I am writing this letter to apply for a job at your museum in response to the half-duration vacancy published on your website. In fact, I had been very incentive to get involved in the volitional work since I was a young child.

As a matter of fact, your museum is considered a historical preference for me and my family for several generations. Moreover, I am quite familiar with every corner of your institute, and I adore each piece of art, sculpture, statue or painting inside it.

In fact, I got convenient experience in the voluntary domain including medical facilities, tutoring schools and environmental organizations. Furthermore, I mastered effective communication skills in order to satisfy all my clientele.

Presently, I am outside the country on a business mission where I will be back on the 30th of this month. After that, I will be eligible to take my annual vacation, so I will be available for six weeks if you are interested.
